item.title: How Build This Site
item.description: I think it’s a good idea for the first post explain how i build this site. It was built using Hugo. Hugo is a very popular open-source static site generators. Install and quickstart with Hugo First of all you have to install Hugo in your system. For this work follow the instruction on the official Hugo’s docs. In my case, I did not want to install directly into my system so I used Docker.
